description:
OBJECTIVE:

Destroy all targets and advance to the next area! Play again and try to beat your times!

CONTROLS:

Move forward: [->] or [D]

Fire gun: [<-] or [A]    ***hold and release to fire a charge shot***

Pause:  [P]

Restart: [R]

Move camera vertically: up/down or [W]/[S] keys
